text: Minor change to layout of the blog page.
Massive updates to engine; code available at Github. New game using the engine at Newgrounds.
Updates to game engine ongoing; currently available at Newgrounds or Kongregate.
First HTML5 game made using (first) draft of engine was temporarily and successfully posted to Kongregate.
First Android game app, Classic Poker Solitaire, is now available.
The blog engine, written from scratch, is up and running!
